response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is truly a masterpiece, designed to exceed expectations and bring you unparalleled benefits. Given its outstanding features and the effort put into its creation, we believe it's worth more than $120 to you. Considering its unique value proposition, I am offering you the opportunity to own this product for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the time, expertise, and dedication that went into making it something truly special. I trust that you will find immense value in it. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 150}
